title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Investment criteria, NPV, benefit cost ratio, payback period, investment appraisal; estimation of project cash flows; risk analysis; cost of capital; long term finance. Project scheduling: delay and cost in projects, project planning through network analysis. operational planning: inventory management, safety stock/EOQ, production scheduling and complaint resolution. Environmental Impacts: Water, soil, air. water pollution. land degradation. air –borne pollutants: gaseous and particulates; remediation and control. impacts on community: job and habitat loss. Introduction to corporate social responsibility.
